jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Responsible for implementing user interface components using React.js and other frontend technologies.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React.js
Knowledge of RESTful APIs
Familiarity with version control systems such as Git

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain server-side logic and APIs using Node.js and Express.
requirements: Strong knowledge of Node.js
Experience with databases such as MongoDB or PostgreSQL
Understanding of REST and GraphQL APIs
Familiarity with cloud services like AWS or Azure

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both frontend and backend components to deliver seamless web applications.
requirements: Experience with both frontend and backend frameworks (React, Node.js)
Proficiency in JavaScript and TypeScript
Ability to design and implement RESTful APIs
Strong problem-solving skills

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.description: Develop and maintain mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms using Flutter.
requirements: Experience with Flutter and Dart
Knowledge of mobile app design principles
Understanding of RESTful APIs
Familiarity with app deployment on Google Play and App Store

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines and ensure system reliability and scalability.
requirements: Proficiency in CI/CD tools such as Jenkins and GitHub Actions
Experience with Docker and Kubernetes
Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS or Azure
Strong scripting skills (Python, Bash)

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Design and optimize user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications.
requirements: Proficiency in design tools like Figma and Adobe XD
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Ability to create wireframes and prototypes
Experience with responsive design
